text: @maggieNYT This is bull💩. I don’t believe anyone in the WH has #COVID19. Just as I didn’t believe Matt Gaetz had it. They’re doing this to give people a false sense of security b/c none of them will end up testing positive—and to also clown 🤡 the press.
